description: Download a VPN client configuration required to connect to Azure via point-to-site.

commands.name: az network p2s-vpn-gateway vpn-client generate
commands.summary: Generate VPN profile for P2S client of the P2SVpnGateway in the specified resource group.
commands.syntax:
az network p2s-vpn-gateway vpn-client generate --name
                                               --resource-group
                                               [--authentication-method {EAPMSCHAPv2, EAPTLS}]
